snippet: In East Ramapo, N.Y., a school board controlled by members of the Orthodox Jewish community has neglected its mission.
abstract: Op-Ed article by Merryl H Tisch, New York State Board of Regents chancellor and David G Sciarra, Education Law Center executive director, holds board of education in East Ramapo, NY, has grossly mismanaged district's finances and educational programs; notes board, dominated by members of Orthodox Jewish community, has brutally cut staffing and programs at expense of African-American and Latino public school students while diverting money to largely Orthodox private schools; calls on legislators to approve plan that would appoint fiscal monitor.

byline.original: By MERRYL H. TISCH and DAVID SCIARRA

lead_paragraph: In East Ramapo, N.Y., a school board controlled by members of the Orthodox Jewish community has neglected its mission.

headline.print_headline: A School Board That Victimizes Kids
headline.main: When a School Board Victimizes Kids
